name: Railway Ticket Booking
author: Abhimanyu
description: Developed a comprehensive railway ticket booking platform where users can create accounts, log in, book train tickets, and cancel them. The system also includes features such as seat availability checking, dynamic fare calculation, and user-friendly booking and cancellation processes. Features: User authentication and authorization , Real-time seat availability and fare calculation ,Option to view and cancel booked tickets.

name: Feedback of Rooms
author: Abhimanyu
description: Created a platform for listing rented rooms and allowing users to provide feedback on these rooms. The system supports room listings, user reviews, and feedback management. Listing of available rented rooms with detailed descriptions, User feedback and review submission for listed rooms, Admin interface for managing room listings and feedback, Responsive design for easy access on various devices
